title: SoC RTVF 379-0-22 Topics in Film/Video/Audio Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
-Overview of class (Generally describe the class here. Include assignment and project information, if desired.)
Students will collectively produce a sitcom that was written in a fall writing course. This course is by permission only and students were selected through a crew petition held by the student executive producers of the sitcom. All students are members of the crew.

-Registration Requirements (Pre-Reqs)
RTVF 190

-Learning Objectives
The successful production of the pilot episode of a new student-written series.

-Teaching Method
Screenings, discussion, and in-class workshop of films.

-Evaluation Method
Students will be graded on professionalism and the strength of the finished episode.

subject: RTVF
